kDesc
"As soon as she walked into his office, he knew disaster was just around the corner. He also knew he would follow her round that corner willingly…" [#Legal]
« Dès qu'elle est entrée dans le bureau, il sut que le désastre l'attendait au tournant. Il sut également qu'il la suivrait volontiers dans ce tournant… » [#Legal]
"Sobald sie sein Büro betreten hatte, wusste er, dass sie Unglück magisch anzieht. Doch er wusste auch, dass sie ihn magisch anzog ..." [#Legal]
"Appena lei entrò nell'ufficio, lui capì che la catastrofe era dietro l'angolo. Ma sapeva anche che l'avrebbe seguita molto volentieri dietro quell'angolo...". [#Legal]
"En cuanto la vio entrar a su oficina, supo que sería su perdición. Aunque quién podría no rendirse ante la tentación...". [#Legal]
「彼女がオフィスに足を踏み入れた瞬間彼は悟った。いずれ辛い思いをするだろう、しかし後悔はしないと。」 [#Legal]
"As soon as she walked into his office, he knew disaster was just around the corner. He also knew he would follow her round that corner willingly…" [#Legal]
